knimeNode.name: XLS Microbial Data Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Loads microbial data from an Excel spreadsheet file

fullDescription.intro: The XLS Microbial Data Reader loads laboratory test data from a Microsoft Excel file, stored for example as bacterial cell counts (log10) per time (hours) for a specific test organism in a matrix with defined test conditions concerning temperature (temp), pH value (ph) and water activity (aw).
fullDescription.option: Load data from an XLS file. The column order in the file should be "ID", "AgentName", "MatrixName", "Comment", "Temperature", "pH", "aw", "Time" and "LogC"

Choose units for time (seconds to weeks), concentration (log10 cell count, ln cell count or cell count) and temperature (°C or °F). The values will automatically be converted to the units used internally by PMM-Lab: Time [h], conc [log10 cfu/g], temperature [°C].
